IndexPage.title: next-intl example
IndexPage.description: This is a basic example that demonstrates the usage of next-intl with the Next.js App Router. Try changing the locale in the top right corner and see how the content changes.

PathnamesPage.title: Pathnames
PathnamesPage.description:
The pathnames are internationalized too.

If you're using the default language English, you'll see /en/pathnames in the browser address bar on this page.

If you change the locale to German, the URL is localized accordingly (/de/pfadnamen).

LocaleLayout.title: Next Wellness App
LocaleLayout.description: Next.js Wellness App is a web application designed to help users track their health and fitness progress

Home.title: Willkommen bei der Next Wellness App
Home.description: Beginnen Sie Ihren Weg zu einem gesÃ¼nderen Ich mit unserem Wellness- und BMI-Rechner. Starten Sie heute Ihre Reise zu einem besseren Lebensstil.
